snippet.title: A Cuban Restaurateur's Comprehension of Ozzie Gullien's Mouth
snippet.description: In the heart of Alphabet City, East Village, New York, resides a gem of a Cuban restaurant named Cafe Cortadito. Ricardo Arias is the Executive Chef and Owner of this diamond-in the-rough establishment on East 3rd St and Avenue B. Over a glass of some of the finest Sangria in [...] read »

snippet.title: In Pictures: 15 Things We Wish Someone Would Invent
CNN Is Liked, But It Needs To Be Loved
snippet.description: Fox News Channel attracts passionate viewers. CNN's are less intense, which hurts ratings. read »
